title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Apache Tika Vulnerabilities

sentences: Impact
titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Apache Tika Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Apache Tika Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Apache Tika Vulnerabilities

sentences: Apache Tika is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) flaw in the StandardsText class in the StandardsExtractingContentHandler. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition.
Apache Tika 1.28.1<crlf>Apache Tika 2.3.0

Apache Tika is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper input validation in the BPG parser. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition.
Upgrade to the latest version of Apache Tika, available from the Apache Web site.
